text: Victorino Martín Andrés (6 March 1929 - 3 October 2017) was a Spanish Fighting Bull cattle rancher. He was born in Madrid, Spain. In 2011, he received the Order of the Second of May, a high honor in Spain. He was known for breeding many Fighting Bulls which were later used for bullfighting in venues in Spain and France. Martín died at his home in Portezuelo, Province of Cáceres, Spain of a stroke on 3 October 2017 at the age of 88.Muere Victorino Martín, la gran figura de los ganaderos de bravo, Andrés Amorós, ABC, 3-10-2017 ==References== ==Other websites== * Web de Victorino Martín * Muere Victorino Martín Category:1929 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:People from Madrid Category:Ranchers
title: Victorino Martín
